articles.description: KTM rider Toby Price leads the 2021 Dakar Rally at the halfway point, while Joan Barreda scored his third stage win of the event so far on Friday's shortened sixth stage.
articles.content: Cut by 100km to 348km following navigational troubles experienced by some competitors on Thursday, the Al Qaisumah-Ha'il test witnessed a tight battle for honours in the motorcycle class, as the top … [+2648 chars]

articles.author: Andrew Wu
articles.title: On-air gaffe: Warne, Symonds in hot water for mocking Labuschagne - Sydney Morning Herald
articles.description: Shane Warne and Andrew Symonds ripped into Marnus Labuschagne for his eccentric mannerisms at the crease, unaware the cameras were recording.
articles.content:
Test batsman Marnus Labuschagne was mocked for his eccentric mannerisms by Shane Warne and Andrew Symonds.Credit:Getty
